description: The force, which has been using a swastika in its emblem since 1918, said it had caused misunderstandings.
title: Finland's air force quietly drops swastika symbol
title_page: Finland's air force quietly drops swastika symbol - BBC News
maintext: The Romantic painter went on to use a swastika as part of his designs for the insignia of the Order of the Cross of Liberty. He used a cross with much smaller hooks, so the visual similarity to Nazi symbolism is much less pronounced. It also features on the official flag of the Finnish president.
